javacsw.services.pkg

Class JSupervisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javacsw.services.pkg.JSupervisor

  • public class JSupervisor
extends java.lang.Object
    Java API for some of the static defs in the Supervisor Scala class

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Supervisor.ToComponentLifecycleMessage DoRestart 
      static Supervisor.ToComponentLifecycleMessage DoShutdown 
      static Supervisor.FromComponentLifecycleMessage HaltComponent
      Diagnostic message to shutdown and then exit supervisor/component
      static Supervisor.FromComponentLifecycleMessage Initialized 
      static Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleFailure
      State of the Supervisor/component after the component has indicated it could not initialize or startup successfully.
      static Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleInitialized
      State of the Supervisor when Initialized after receiving the [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.Initialized]] message (first) from the component
      static Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecyclePreparingToShutdown
      State of the Supervisor/component after receiving an [[csw.services.pkg.SupervisorExternal.ExComponentShutdown]] message to shutdown the component.
      static Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleRunning
      State of the Supervisor after receiving the [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.Started]] message (second) from the component.
      static Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleRunningOffline
      State of the Supervisor/component after receiving an [[csw.services.pkg.SupervisorExternal.ExComponentOffline]] message to place the component offline.
      static Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleShutdown
      State of the Supervisor/component after the component has indicated it is ready to shutdown after receiving the [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.ShutdownComplete]] message.
      static Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleShutdownFailure
      State of the Supervisor/component when the component indicated it could not get ready to shutdown or failed to notify the Supervisor with the [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.ShutdownComplete]] message within the timeout.
      static Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleWaitingForInitialized
      State of the Supervisor when started and waiting for the first lifecycle message from the component.
      static Supervisor.ToComponentLifecycleMessage Running 
      static Supervisor.ToComponentLifecycleMessage RunningOffline 
      static Supervisor.FromComponentLifecycleMessage ShutdownComplete
      Component indicates it has completed shutting down successfully
      static Supervisor.FromComponentLifecycleMessage Started
      Component indicates it has started successfully

    • Field Detail

      • LifecycleWaitingForInitialized

        public static final Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleWaitingForInitialized
        State of the Supervisor when started and waiting for the first lifecycle message from the component.

      • LifecycleInitialized

        public static final Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleInitialized
        State of the Supervisor when Initialized after receiving the [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.Initialized]] message (first) from the component

      • LifecycleRunning

        public static final Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleRunning
        State of the Supervisor after receiving the [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.Started]] message (second) from the component. Component is Running and Online at this point. Component receives a [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.Running]] message indicating this.

      • LifecycleRunningOffline

        public static final Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleRunningOffline
        State of the Supervisor/component after receiving an [[csw.services.pkg.SupervisorExternal.ExComponentOffline]] message to place the component offline. The component receives the [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.RunningOffline]] message indicating this.

      • LifecyclePreparingToShutdown

        public static final Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecyclePreparingToShutdown
        State of the Supervisor/component after receiving an [[csw.services.pkg.SupervisorExternal.ExComponentShutdown]] message to shutdown the component. The component receives the [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.DoShutdown]] message indicating this.

      • LifecycleFailure

        public static final Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleFailure
        State of the Supervisor/component after the component has indicated it could not initialize or startup successfully.

      • LifecycleShutdown

        public static final Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleShutdown
        State of the Supervisor/component after the component has indicated it is ready to shutdown after receiving the [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.ShutdownComplete]] message.

      • LifecycleShutdownFailure

        public static final Supervisor.LifecycleState LifecycleShutdownFailure
        State of the Supervisor/component when the component indicated it could not get ready to shutdown or failed to notify the Supervisor with the [[csw.services.pkg.Supervisor.ShutdownComplete]] message within the timeout.

      • DoShutdown

        public static final Supervisor.ToComponentLifecycleMessage DoShutdown

      • DoRestart

        public static final Supervisor.ToComponentLifecycleMessage DoRestart

      • Running

        public static final Supervisor.ToComponentLifecycleMessage Running

      • RunningOffline

        public static final Supervisor.ToComponentLifecycleMessage RunningOffline

      • Initialized

        public static final Supervisor.FromComponentLifecycleMessage Initialized

      • Started

        public static final Supervisor.FromComponentLifecycleMessage Started
        Component indicates it has started successfully

      • ShutdownComplete

        public static final Supervisor.FromComponentLifecycleMessage ShutdownComplete
        Component indicates it has completed shutting down successfully

      • HaltComponent

        public static final Supervisor.FromComponentLifecycleMessage HaltComponent
        Diagnostic message to shutdown and then exit supervisor/component

    • Constructor Detail

      • JSupervisor

        public JSupervisor()

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static akka.actor.ActorRef create(Component.ComponentInfo componentInfo)
        Returns a new supervisor actor managing the components described in the argument
        Parameters:
        componentInfo - describes the components to create and manage
        Returns:
        the actorRef for the supervisor (parent actor of the top level component)
